lead_paragraph: More than a few Canadian companies are ready to go public, though only a handful -- some gutsy tech startups with heavy backing -- are likely to brave the recent market turbulence and take the final step.
snippet: More than a few Canadian companies are ready to go public, though only a handful -- some gutsy tech startups with heavy backing -- are likely to brave the recent market turbulence and take the final step.

headline.main: Canadian I.P.O.'s Said to Be on the Horizon

abstract: More than a few Canadian companies are ready to go public, though only a handful -- some gutsy tech startups with heavy backing -- are likely to brave the recent market turbulence and take the final step.
